* The {@link PreferenceInflater} is used to inflate preference hierarchies from * XML files. *

* Do not construct this directly, instead use * {@link Context#getSystemService(String)} with * {@link Context#PREFERENCE_INFLATER_SERVICE}. * * @deprecated Use the AndroidX * * Preference Library for consistent behavior across all devices. For more information on * using the AndroidX Preference Library see * Settings.
